metadata.title: CVE-2024-42119 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Skip finding free audio for unknown engine_id[WHY]ENGINE_ID_UNKNOWN = -1 and can not be used as an array index. Plus, italso means it is uninitialized and does not need free audio.[HOW]Skip and return NULL.This fixes 2 OVERRUN issues reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
